approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit and internal requirements.
Reduce dependency on the IT team for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency in accessing and managing V-KYC recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT team to provide recordings stored on the NFS server. This process is manual and time-consuming. This project aims to streamline the process by providing a self-service portal.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created to provide access to V-KYC recordings.
The portal should allow users to search recordings by LAN ID.
The portal should allow users to search recordings by date and month.
The recordings should be displayed in a tabular format.
The table should have pagination to display 10 records at a time.
The portal should provide an option to upload a file (Excel or text) containing LAN IDs for bulk download.
The uploaded file should allow a maximum of 50 LAN IDs.
The system should trigger a backend API call to process the bulk download request.
The system should provide a "Download All" option for bulk downloads.
The access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: User authentication and authorization for accessing the portal.
Search functionality by date and month.
Display recordings in a tabular format with pagination.
File upload functionality for bulk download (CSV/TXT).
Backend API integration for processing bulk download requests.
Download all option for bulk downloads.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the portal should be restricted to Team Leads and Process Managers.
The system should be secure and protect sensitive data.
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and download V-KYC recordings.
The bulk download functionality works as expected.
The IT team's involvement in providing recordings is significantly reduced.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF NFS server.
File upload format is limited to CSV/TXT.
Maximum 50 LAN IDs allowed per bulk download request.
assumptions: The backend API for processing download requests is available and functional.
The NFS server is accessible and the recordings are stored in a consistent format.
The necessary infrastructure and resources are available for portal deployment.
risks: Backend API failure could disrupt the bulk download functionality.
Security vulnerabilities could compromise the confidentiality of recordings.
Performance issues could arise during peak usage.
